p: The up-regulation of SDF-1α and vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF), both chemotactic factors, in serum increases mobilization and recruitment of EPCs in the face of acute ischemic injury for repair and regeneration [ 23– 26]. It is postulated that DPP-4 inhibitors may increase EPCs mobilization from the bone marrow via their role in increased SDF-1α presence in serum [ 12].
